title: Lemon Swiss roll with passionfruit cream and lemon drizzle glaze
description: Swiss rolls are easier to make than you may think, but you need to have courage when rolling. This one, filled with passionfruit cream and garnished with berries, is sure to impress.
ingredients: 115g/4oz caster sugar, plus extra for dusting
1 vanilla pod, cut in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
